##What is technology -- what kind of data monitoring have you experienced?

Micro signal

What happened before the Earth was destroyed?

##All the fish are now updated in allthefishnews.wordpress.com  and can be subscribed by mail. You can copy the top link in the browser to open the get a subscription link.

Someone once had the idea of adding a traceable code to every entry of personal information, such as placing an order for a particular item and entering the name as Wang, a particular group, or a particular item, in order to find out where the leak had come from.

The reason why you have to extrapolate the path back is because you don't trust the system. Every facial recognition, every fingerprint, every entry: Name, ID number, phone, email, address, gender, age... where they're assembled, what system they're in, who sees them, who uses them, how to use it. Such gathering is increasingly pervasive, but few feel the need to explain anything to the person being gathered.

During an outbreak, there seems to be more reason to collect human data in order to prevent the spread of the disease and to precisely control the population carrying the virus, and the time has come for the accumulation of data to be used. There have been some changes in the relationship between people and technology: On the one hand, people are starting to face more moments of being collected, and on the other hand, the scrutiny, thinking, questioning that comes from being gathered about one's own information is now more focused.

In the face of a large opaque, perhaps only through the countless personal experience, it can be pieced out of the shape of the faint. Each guess brings us closer to what it really is.

The shape of the shadow is constantly clear through the accumulation of experience. It may have made you realize that the leak was severe, pinpoint and chilling, or not so severe that you thought it should have been used, but it wasn't there in time, or full of errors and omissions... advanced and unexpected laggards of unregulated technology exist side by side, alternating with uncertainty. Of course, you may not be in favor of or against it, but in the process of exposure, awareness of the so-called "big data" system has increased.

We are here to collect personal experiences, hoping to focus on the moment during the epidemic when individuals and information surveillance systems met.

Here is a questionnaire with a list of questions that you can answer one by one, and you are welcome to tell your story in full text or by communicating directly with us. (leave your contact information at the end of the questionnaire or in the background and send it to allthefish@mail. com.)

Eventually, we'll publish the content we've collected. All information in the feedback will not include your personal ID, please feel free to fill in. Scan the following Qr code or click read the original to get the questionnaire. Thank you for sharing, and welcome to help us pass it on to your friends. If you have questions, you can leave a message or contact the public at allthefish@mail. com. Com

During the outbreak, information technology was used as follows:

Health CODE AND ITS ITERATIONS:

2.11. Hangzhou takes the lead in launching the city-wide "Health Code" system: The system is based on alipay platform. On the 18th, the "need to apply for Hangzhou Health Code" was extended to "all citizens and people coming to Hangzhou and returning to Hangzhou" . The scope of application: within the city limits, including Enterprises, shopping malls, supermarkets, subways, financial outlets, medical and health institutions, buses, taxis (online car) and other places.
Zhang Zhongcan, deputy secretary of the CPC Hangzhou municipal committee, has mentioned three dimensions involved in the Algorithm: One is the spatial dimension; two is the time dimension, that is, the number of times to visit the epidemic areas and the length of time; and three is the interpersonal dimension, that is, the state of contact with close people.
3.1. Beijing "Health Treasure" small program on-line: The first time to enter the name, identity card number, and face recognition, you can query their health status, the results were identified in red, yellow, and Green as "focused observation, " "home observation, " and "nothing unusual. ".
Up to now, alipay health code has been more than 200 cities online, promotion. Among them, Zhejiang, Sichuan, Hainan, Chongqing, Shanghai, Yunnan, Shanxi and other provinces and cities have achieved full coverage.

The New York Times reports that when a checkpoint employee scans a person's health code, his current location appears to be sent to the system server.

Public Transport / DRUG PURCHASE REAL NAME REGISTRATION:

On February 6, Shenyang asked the MTA to organize city-wide subway stations, public transport vehicles (buses, subways, trams) and taxi to implement the implementation of name registration. Citizens Scan qr codes while riding, import effective contact information, complete real-name authentication.
The Xiamen Market Supervision Bureau issued a notice to 1,505 pharmacies in the city on January 24, requiring each pharmacy to establish a collection form for information on patients who buy medicines for treating fever and cough, and to strictly implement the body temperature measurement system for people entering the pharmacy.

City control and prevention system

After the outbreak of the disease, the Hangzhou Municipal Health and Health Commission and the Public Security System first established the health and COVID-19 prevention and control system through the city's brain platform, and cooperated with the three major mobile operators, after coming to Hangzhou, will receive a request on the mobile phone to tell the past history voluntarily the short message.
Shanghai quickly launched the "dynamic health observation system for people coming to Shanghai" section when the resumption of work comes, covering airports, railways, highways, waterways and other routes to Shanghai, and replacing manual statistical visits with information technology, collection of basic health information for residents in Shanghai. (as of February 22, more than 2.91 million people had registered for the system.)

Monitoring Equipment

DRONES: So far, taizhou, Hangzhou, Jiaxing, Huzhou, Shaoxing, Jinhua and Quzhou have conducted more than 600 air patrols using fixed-wing and multi-rotor-wing drones, covering more than 400 residential areas, more than 40 squares and more than 10 closed scenic spots, more than 800 people were reminded to wear masks and more than 100 backpackers were persuaded to leave.
SMART DOOR MAGNET: China Telecom introduced the smart door magnet. After installing the NB-IoT smart door magnet to the families in need of isolation, if the door is opened to go out, the backstage immediately generates an alarm, and the first time through SMS or Voice real-time push to the community grid mobile phone.

FACE RECOGNITION WITH MASK: the AI of tencent Youtu can not only realize face recognition to the person wearing the mask, but also can find the wrong person wearing the mask. The accuracy rate of face recognition with mask wearing is over 99% .

During the outbreak, information technology was used as follows:

Health CODE AND ITS ITERATIONS:

2.11. Hangzhou takes the lead in launching the city-wide "Health Code" system: The system is based on alipay platform. City control and prevention system

After the outbreak of the disease, the Hangzhou Municipal Health and Health Commission and the Public Security System first established the health and COVID-19 prevention and control system through the city's brain platform, and cooperated with the three major mobile operators, after coming to Hangzhou, will receive a request on the mobile phone to tell the past history voluntarily the short message.

(as of February 22, more than 2.91 million people had registered for the system.)

Monitoring Equipment

DRONES: So far, taizhou, Hangzhou, Jiaxing, Huzhou, Shaoxing, Jinhua and Quzhou have conducted more than 600 air patrols using fixed-wing and multi-rotor-wing drones, covering more than 400 residential areas, more than 40 squares and more than 10 closed scenic spots, more than 800 people were reminded to wear masks and more than 100 backpackers were persuaded to leave.
